items.sentence: Tom is in the next room, explaining what happened.
Tom is one of the guys that Mary is interested in.
I can\'t bear the thought of her with another man.
I can\'t figure out why nobody comes here anymore.
I can\'t say I share your enthusiasm for the idea.
I can\'t tell you how much I appreciate your help.
I can\'t turn it on, because the switch is broken.
It was obvious that Tom didn\'t want to kiss Mary.
I\'m the one who convinced Tom to stop doing that.
I\'m thinking that I should take French next year.
